tags.name: Custom profile fields
tags.description: An admin feature used to create a customized user profile form, which is used to collect additional user information upon successful registrations.

200.description: Custom profile fields ordered by sieOrder (Sign-in Experience order).

post.description: Create multiple custom profile fields in a single request (max 20 items).

get.summary: Get a custom profile field by name
get.description: Get a custom profile field by name.

put.description: Update a custom profile field by name.

delete.description: Delete a custom profile field by name.

post.summary: Update the display order of the custom profile fields in Sign-in Experience.
